channel.title: Boss Godot on GDQuest
channel.description: Recent content in Boss Godot on GDQuest

item.title: Godot 3 course: the boss chapter is out!
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: In this month’s update you get one new chapter in the course. This is the hardest and probably the biggest series I made so far: chapter 5 is dedicated to boss creation. This builds upon chapters 1 to 3 and brings the state programming pattern to everyone, whether you’ve got the essentials, the indie, or the pro version. As the boss chapter took twice the time I planned to invest in it, I couldn’t finish the essentials version in May.
